Hey  SSB can be redeemed any month with both prorated interest and original principle sum (regardless of interest rate environment as it is backed by sg govt). So you can treat it like 10 year FD with flexible redemption clause.Should you want to move your money to invest elsewhere you can always redeem SSB and plop into something else
